description: This warm pumpkin bread pudding from Chloe Coscarelli, the vegan chef and cookbook author, is generously-spiced and studded with semisweet chocolate chips It’s a rich and creamy dessert that’s free of dairy and eggs but will leave everyone feeling as if they have indulged.
title: Chocolate-Pumpkin Bread Pudding
title_page: Chocolate-Pumpkin Bread Pudding Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This warm pumpkin bread pudding from Chloe Coscarelli, the vegan chef and cookbook author, is generously-spiced and studded with semisweet chocolate chips. It’s a rich and creamy dessert that’s free of dairy and eggs but will leave everyone feeling as if they have indulged.
Featured in: Well's Vegetarian Thanksgiving 2010.
